description:
This plugin has been recently acquired by Zeroqode - please bear with us while we review the code and make improvements/fixes where necessary.

This plugin lets you open a URL in a new tab using workflows so that you don't have to rely on the link element anymore. This plugin in supports elements like text, groups, shapes, images and icons on all browsers (without triggering a popup block). The button element may trigger a popup block the first time on Firefox/edge due to browser restrictions.

To receive special offers and important updates please visit: https://zeroqo.de/updates

name: Open URL In New Tab
plugin_instructions:
This plugin in supports elements like text, groups, shapes, images and icons on all browsers(without triggering a popup block). The button element may trigger a popup block the first time on Firefox/edge due to browser restrictions.

1, Give your element a unique element id. If you don't have this option in the element editor you have to enable it in the settings.

2, When you create a workflow go the the 'plugin' tab and there you can select the 'open URL in New Tab Action'. Make sure to include 'https://' when using a URL. For element ID use the element ID you have given your element in step 1.
